statements: SELECT * FROM wallets;
SELECT id, wallet_name FROM wallets WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT wallet_name, private_key FROM wallets WHERE id = 3;
SELECT * FROM wallets WHERE user_id = 2 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, wallet_name FROM wallets WHERE user_id = 3 ORDER BY wallet_name ASC;
SELECT id, user_id, wallet_name FROM wallets WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM wallets WHERE id = 5;
SELECT wallet_name, private_key FROM wallets WHERE user_id = 2 ORDER BY wallet_name DESC;
SELECT id, wallet_name FROM wallets WHERE user_id = 3 AND wallet_name LIKE '%crypto%';
SELECT id, user_id, wallet_name, private_key FROM wallets WHERE id > 2 ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM wallet_private_keys;
SELECT wallet_name, private_key FROM wallet_private_keys WHERE wallet_name = 'John';
SELECT wallet_name, private_key FROM wallet_private_keys ORDER BY wallet_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM wallet_transactions WHERE amount > 100;
SELECT * FROM wallet_transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM wallet_private_keys WHERE wallet_name='Alice';
SELECT id, private_key FROM wallet_private_keys WHERE id='123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date FROM wallet_transactions WHERE wallet_id='123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001' ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT wallet_name, private_key FROM wallet_private_keys WHERE private_key LIKE '%abc%' AND wallet_name IS NOT NULL ORDER BY wallet_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM wallet_transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY amount DESC, transaction_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM wallet_keys;
SELECT user_id, created_at FROM wallet_keys ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE id = 10;
SELECT wallet_id, amount, type, timestamp FROM transactions WHERE type = 'credit';
SELECT * FROM wallet_keys JOIN users ON wallet_keys.id = users.id;
SELECT * FROM wallet_keys WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT id, encrypted_private_key FROM wallet_keys WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, user_id, MAX(created_at) as latest_key_creation FROM wallet_keys GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT t.id, t.wallet_id, t.amount, t.timestamp, u.username FROM transactions t INNER JOIN users u ON t.wallet_id = u.id;
SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY amount DESC, timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT wallet_address, private_key FROM wallet_accounts WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT transaction_id, wallet_address, amount, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE email='example@gmail.com';
SELECT user_id, username FROM users ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE username='JohnDoe' AND email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT wallet_address, private_key FROM wallet_accounts WHERE id=101 OR id=105;
SELECT transaction_id, wallet_address, amount, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM wallet_users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM wallet_users ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT address_id, user_id, address FROM wallet_addresses WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT key_data FROM wallet_keys WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT log_id, log_details FROM wallet_logs ORDER BY log_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM wallet_users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, password FROM wallet_users WHERE username LIKE '%John%' ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT * FROM wallet_keys JOIN wallet_users ON wallet_keys.user_id = wallet_users.user_id WHERE wallet_users.username = 'Alice';
SELECT sender_address, receiver_address, amount FROM wallet_transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT user_id, LEFT(log_details, 50) AS short_log_details FROM wallet_logs WHERE LENGTH(log_details) > 100 ORDER BY user_id;
